subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
World Series
lead_paragraph: Among the sedate suburban blocks of Stony Brook, N.Y., pitcher Steven Matz, who is scheduled to start for the Mets on Saturday night, is a local boy made good.
snippet: Among the sedate suburban blocks of Stony Brook, N.Y., pitcher Steven Matz, who is scheduled to start for the Mets on Saturday night, is a local boy made good.
